name: @akashic/engine-files
description: A library that manages versions of libraries related to Akashic Engine

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:full && npm run build:canvas && npm run build:gr
scripts.build:full: npm run build:full:parts && npm run build:full:zip:debug && npm run build:full:zip:release
scripts.build:full:zip:debug: shx cp -r dist/raw/debug/full akashic_engine && zip -r dist/akashic_engine.debug.zip ./akashic_engine && shx rm -r akashic_engine
scripts.build:full:zip:release: shx cp -r dist/raw/release/full akashic_engine && zip -r dist/akashic_engine.zip ./akashic_engine && shx rm -r akashic_engine
scripts.build:canvas: npm run build:canvas:parts && npm run build:canvas:zip:debug && npm run build:canvas:zip:release
scripts.build:canvas:zip:debug: shx cp -r dist/raw/debug/canvas akashic_engine && zip -r dist/akashic_engine.canvas.debug.zip ./akashic_engine && shx rm -r akashic_engine
scripts.build:canvas:zip:release: shx cp -r dist/raw/release/canvas akashic_engine && zip -r dist/akashic_engine.canvas.zip ./akashic_engine && shx rm -r akashic_engine
scripts.build:gr: npm run build:gr:parts && npm run build:gr:zip
scripts.build:gr:parts: shx mkdir -p dist/raw/gr/ && npm run build:gr:ae && npm run build:gr:gdr && npm run build:gr:pci

author: DWANGO Co., Ltd.
